Source code for mymusic.controllers.admin

import logging

from pylons import request, response, session, tmpl_context as c, url
from pylons.controllers.util import abort, redirect

from mymusic.lib.base import BaseController, render
from mymusic.lib.auth import *
from paste.request import construct_url

log = logging.getLogger(__name__)


[docs]class AdminController(BaseController):
    """
    For rendering the admin Page
    """

    @authorize(IsAdmin(), adminhandler)

[docs]    def index(self):
        """
        Render admin page
        """
        c.host = construct_url(request.environ, with_query_string=False, with_path_info=False)
        return render("/derived/admin/index.html")
